## Bubble Shooter: A Classic Game

Bubble Shooter is a classic game that has been enjoyed by people of all ages for decades. This game is simple, yet highly addictive, making it the perfect pastime for those who want to relax and de-stress after a long day. In this article, we will explore the history of Bubble Shooter, how to play it, and how it has evolved over the years.

### The History of Bubble Shooter

Bubble Shooter was created in 1994 by Absolutist, a Ukrainian software company. The game was initially released for Windows, but over the years, it has been adapted to various operating systems, including iOS and Android. Since its creation, Bubble Shooter has become one of the most popular and well-loved games in the world.

### How to Play Bubble Shooter

The rules of Bubble Shooter are simple: you must shoot bubbles from a cannon to create groups of three or more bubbles of the same color. The aim of the game is to clear the screen of all bubbles. You lose the game if the bubbles reach the bottom of the screen.

To shoot a bubble, you must aim the cannon by moving it with your mouse or finger. Once you are ready to shoot, click or tap the screen to release the bubble. If you manage to create a group of three or more bubbles of the same color, they will pop, and you will earn points.

There are a few things you need to be aware of when playing Bubble Shooter. First, you will notice that the bubbles move closer to the bottom of the screen after each shot. Second, if you shoot a bubble and it does not join any groups of the same color, it will stay on the screen, making it harder for you to complete the level. Finally, some levels have obstacles, such as walls or bubbles that cannot be popped. You will need to use strategy to plan your moves and complete these levels.

### Evolution of Bubble Shooter

Over the years, Bubble Shooter has evolved into many different variations. Some of these include Bubble Witch, Bubble Breaker, and Bubble Birds. These games have the same basic idea as Bubble Shooter, but they add unique twists to make the game more challenging and exciting.

In recent years, Bubble Shooter has become available on social platforms, such as Facebook. These versions of the game allow you to compete with your friends and share your scores.

### Conclusion

Bubble Shooter is a game that has stood the test of time. Despite its simplicity, it provides hours of entertainment for people around the world. If you have never played Bubble Shooter before, give it a try - you might just find yourself hooked on this classic game.
